评论详情: What I like: The fabric is extremely soft. Haze blue is a fantastic color. The pants have deep pockets which is great for me. I always struggle with finding pants to carry around my phone and chapstick. With these, no worries. The fit is very loose and comfortable.  What I don't like: I run a little cold, so I am not a fan of the sleeveless top. No biggie as I will just add a long shirt underneath. I am sure it is fine for others but if you have the same issue just be aware.  Overall, I am very happy with this outfit and will wear it often. It is definitely worth the price!

评论概述: Not really sweats but really nice
评论详情: I was assuming this would be a thick weave and heavy, given that they refer to it as sweats, but it isn't. It's about twice the weight of a T Shirt and extremely smooth and soft. I really like it, but I don't see calling it sweats. It's stretchy and smooth and not too hot for spring and fall without particular sweating. If you want these to keep you toasty in the winter, well, you'll need to layer up with this.  The shirt is a basic sleeveless thing which works very well as an undershirt or over, as preferred. The fit is not tight but also isn't what I'd describe as loose, either. It's right about exactly where things are expected to fit.  The pants are looser, making them less appropriate as an under layer, but making them top notch for PJs. They can work as activewear, too, of course. If layering, their stretch & the general looseness let these work well as the outer layer. The elastic is moderate and there's a lace to cinch it up and secure it. The only questionable choice is the exposed seams, which is a fashion choice, but not a manufacturing defect.  They are made quite well. The lace end caps are metal, even. Didn't see any issues in the seams and such. It's not what I was expecting, but the set is nice.

评论概述: So soft, and love the color
评论详情: This is a really nice two-piece set, love the color! Both the shirt and pants are well constructed; cut and fit are true to size. It's really cold here now, but this set will be perfect for an upcoming vacay where it's supposed to be mid-70s, and of course will be wearing them this spring and summer here. Love that the pants have pockets, and that they are a generous size...won't be worried about the cell phone slipping out. Haven't washed it yet, but similar fabric blends wash and dry well, so would be surprised if these don't do the same. If that isn't the case, will come back and amend this review.

评论概述: Fabric is soft and have a good weight to it.
评论详情: Got this for my wife. First it is true to size. We have the olive green color and it matches the photos on the listing. The cutting is good, it looks really on her body.  The fabric is soft yet have have good thickness (so it doesn't print everything under it, it's still will show if you have something thick on under) This is more like a summer fabric. The fabric is very stretchy, no restrictions of movement.  Very flattering. She said this will be in her frequent rotation for coming spring.  Came vacuum packed and no odd smell.

This set was made well and with a nice soft feel, however it is not for me.  What is hard for many women is if the pants fit the top won't and the other way around.  The top was too big for me and the pants I felt were a little too small.  That being said, it is a nice set, you just need to be sure that the size you choose will fit both top and bottom.

The top fit a little smaller than my wife hoped for so definitely size up for a looser fit. The material is awesome and very soft to the touch, the navy blue color is beautiful in person, and the pants are true to size.  The material thickness is great from spring to fall due to how light it is, unless you live in a warmer climate where you can wear it year round. The only real complaint is regarding the sleeves, they are not as pictured and much shorter on the actual garment. It gives a weird fit to the top.

This is a very nice (2) piece lounge set.  The material is super soft and comfortable which is always a big plus for me.  The top is sleeveless so it’s going to be great for the warmer months.  It is made of a lighter weight sweatsuit material that I really like and the inside is lined with a silky type material that even makes it more comfortable.  It hangs well and this could be worn to travel in as well as for lounging.  I am 5’6”/150 and ordered a size LARGE.  It fits well and is in my opinion worth the higher price.  This is indeed a nice set.

评论概述: Good looking Lounge set, Good Material
评论详情: Material feels good quality. Color looks nicer. Fabric feels great, comfortable, breathable, easy to wear. The attractive design with that sleeveless top make it stylish for many occasions.

These set it’s perfect for summer or spring. The fabric is excellent - soft and comfy.  They're stylish and cool with the sleeveless tops and wide-leg pants, plus they have pockets, YAY!  The only reason I took 1 start it’s because the sizing runs a bit small, so you might want to order a size up.

I am enjoying this set as I can wear it at home or on the go.  It fits very well and is soft feel fabric.  I can dress it up with a colorful scarf and dangly earrings for a lunch date or as is for a quiet day at home.  It was a good price and I happily recommend this item.

Nicely made, very comfortable.  Great quality.  True to size

评论概述: Decent Lounge Outfit, But Runs Small
评论详情: My wife was excited to try this lounge outfit, and there's a couple feature that really stands out: the pockets and the softness. It's material is soft and the pockets are super convenient and a great addition to the design.  However, unfortunately, that's where the positives end for me. The outfit top is quite short and tight-fitting, which isn't ideal for lounging around. I think it runs small, so if you're considering purchasing, you might want to size up.  Overall, the fit and length of the outfit fall short. Maybe others will have a better experience, but for now, it's an average 3 stars from me.

This  lounge set is perfect for relaxing at home or running errands. The sleeveless top is super comfortable and keeps me cool on hot days. The pants are just as great – they have wide legs that give a relaxed fit, and the pockets are a nice touch for convenience. The fabric is soft and breathable, making it my go-to outfit for warmer days.

评论概述: Attractive set: GRECERELLE 2 Piece Sets For Women Summer
评论详情: When I first received this set, at first glance, I thought the pants would be too long but I was pleasantly surprised they fit perfectly. Very soft and well made stretch material that’s forgiving and flattering. These are advertised as for lounging but with the quality of material, you could easily dress up with a shawl and flats/heels. I didn’t find any flaws or defects in this set. I will definitely be packing for an upcoming trip.

They hold up really well in the wash, and the sizing is just right, making them a great choice for casual wear.
Beautiful blue color. Soft comfortable material. Fits perfectly. Looks fabulous.
clothes fit as expected, 10/10 for the quality

This is a super cute and comfortable set. Pants run true to size. Top fits well also. It is a little awkward having the top go out over the drawstring. I like the elastic waist of the pants. Good size and good length. Looks sharp. Comfortable.
